title: Records Reveal Extent of CIA’s Mishandling of Sexual Misconduct
description:
Appeals filed with Equal Employment Opportunity Commission support reports of a breakdown in the CIA office that responds to misconduct claims.

The post Records Reveal Extent of CIA’s Mishandling of Sexual Misconduct appeared first on The Intercept.

title: How to Not Get Arrested After Killing Someone in Public
description:
The NYPD’s treatment of a white man who strangled Jordan Neely, an unhoused Black man, on the subway is not how things usually go down.

The post How to Not Get Arrested After Killing Someone in Public appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Ron DeSantis Has Raked in $3.9 Million From Insurance Industry, New Report Reveals
description:
The governor has overseen a dramatic rise in home insurance premiums and legislative giveaways to insurance companies.

The post Ron DeSantis Has Raked in $3.9 Million From Insurance Industry, New Report Reveals appeared first on The Intercept.

title: China, the Peacemaker?
description:
Historian Alfred W. McCoy discusses China’s rapid economic and political rise and how Beijing is well positioned to broker an end to the war in Ukraine.

The post China, the Peacemaker? appeared first on The Intercept.

title: French Police Are Sweeping Up Protesters and Bystanders in Crackdown on Dissent
description:
French authorities are detaining demonstrators without filing charges as public anger persists over President Emmanuel Macron’s unpopular hike in the retirement age.

The post French Police Are Sweeping Up Protesters and Bystanders in Crackdown on Dissent appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Activists Face Felonies for Distributing Flyers on "Cop City" Protester Killing
description:
The activists face 20 years in prison for handing out flyers that identified a cop they said was linked to the killing of a protester in the Atlanta forest.

The post Activists Face Felonies for Distributing Flyers on “Cop City” Protester Killing appeared first on The Intercept.
